## RootMethod type

Root method signature - defines the always-rendered root layout

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type RootMethod<TConfig extends AdapterConfig> = (path: string, connectedComponent: (routeContext: RouteContext<TConfig>) => RefSpec<TConfig['baseElement']>) => RootContext<TConfig>;
```
